role.descr: impelled agent, incentives provided to whom?
incentivized action, arg1 now has incentives to do what?

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Let business pay for more of our transportation bill, which-1 they will pass to us, of course, and *T*-1 incentivize them to locate where they put the least stress on the system.
example.arg: to locate where they put the least stress on the system
